pageContext.claim: “Yeah, we're interviewing a lot of -- we have a lot of great people for Chief of Staff. A lot of people want the job. A lot of people want the job. And I have some great people. A lot of friends of mine want it.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump had tremendous difficulty filling the job of chief of staff, with his first two choices turning him down. He finally named his budget chief as acting chief of staff.
